hackathon-description-text: The Hopper Storm & Finagle Hackathon is an all-day power hack during which ~140 minds get access to a huge cluster (100 8-core instances with 32GB RAM and 250GB disk per node) and are set free to create something awesome using Storm.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: A 1-year subscription for compute from SoftLayer.

hackathon-description-header: Join us for a full day of Storm hacking on a 100-node cluster! The crowd-voted best team wins a 1-year subscription for SoftLayer (a $12,000 value)!
